result.title: D2.3 First Motion adaptation and style transfer
result.description: This first demonstrator will display the implementation of morphology-and-style character adaptation applied to volumetric motion-captured data. Typically we will show how characteristics of the motions need to be adapted to match the morphology and style of the given character (e.g. heaviness, strength, cartoon animation style motions, etc.).
